name: Coconut Macaroons
author: Dorothy Glastetter

ingredients.name: pkg. (16 oz.) Angel Food Cake Mix

instructions: Preheat oven to 350Â°. Mix cake mix, almond extract and water together for 3 minutes on medium speed. Stir in coconut. May need to add small about of flour. Drop by scant teaspoon onto foil lined cookie sheets, which are sprayed with non stick cooking spray. Bake 7-9 minute or until edges are light brown. Cool completely before removing from foil. Best made with the one-step cake mix.
